nodes.text: Paul Sudlow was a Star Wars line editor and designer at West End Games from 1995 to 1998. Notable projects include Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, Second Edition, Revised and Expanded, The Jedi Academy Sourcebook, Lords of the Expanse, Heroes & Rogues, and The DarkStryder Campaign. He also contributed to Decipher's Star Wars CCG and Coruscant and the Core Worlds by Wizards of the Coast.
The character Pol Treidum was named after Sudlow.
